entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
